title: Resolution regarding the voting system and the instrument used in elections
description: Mandates Instant Runoff Voting for all elections and approves a bot for recording votes.
content:
**A RESOLUTION**
*of the Congress of the Bayer Free State*

entitled "Resolution regarding the voting system and the instrument used in elections", reference number: RES_2-5-2021/00002

__RESOLVED__ that:
1.  Elections shall be held under the Instant Runoff Voting system except for additional elections where it is deemed appropriate to use a different voting system.
2. @Minister of Interior#2538 shall be the state-approved official instrument for recording votes in all elections which shall use the aforementioned IRV system.

This Resolution shall require a supermajority in order to pass the Congress.
